title: Consenz: A Virtual Parliament App
description: Discussions regarding the future of Cardano & Catalyst are spread around many platforms and are disconnected from the voting process.
solution: A decision-making tool that provides a way to create community-driven solutions by integrating continuous voting with discussion features.
experience: 10 years of research & experiment in decentralized decision making. 6 years as a projects manager. 3 years of building consenz prototype.
